text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 18 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Atoi Boru ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Vénuste Niyongabo ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Kevin Sullivan ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 1500 metres
